title: TrafficVille 3D v1.0 [PD]
description:
Play God with these amazing Apocalyptic Bonuses: the Tsunami Waves and Meteor Shower.

Keep the traffic flowing, avoid huge car crashes and see how high you can get up on the leaderboard in this totally addictive 3D game.

Do you think you can make it? Think again! As you progress through the levels the traffic lights become time controlled and do not stay red for more than seven seconds.

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 
- Apocalyptic Bonuses: Tsunami Waves and Meteor Shower 
- FIRST 3D traffic control game where cars are turning left/right and you control up to six traffic lights 
- Two modes: Day and Night - Weather control: Rain, Snow and Sun 
- 3D app with FULL HD/Retina Display 
- Control six Traffic lights
- Play with over ten type of vehicles: six car models, fire trucks, trains, airplanes, helicopters 
- Beware of fire trucks, airplanes or helicopters! 
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 
HOW TO PLAY 
Prevent crashes by tapping the traffic lights Get points for safely guiding the traffic Clear the lane when you hear the Fire Truck's siren!

More info:
